content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Bug Reproductions\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What are reproductions and what are they good for?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Executing a bug reproduction means retesting a bug submitted by another Tester. For this task, you don't need to do any exploratory testing, but to simply replicate an already found bug. To reproduce a bug, you should follow the same steps described in the original bug report in order to confirm whether it can or cannot be replicated on your device. Before executing a bug reproduction, make sure to read the bug report carefully and understand the bug first before reproducing it.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Bug reproductions help to understand on which devices the bug can and cannot be reproduced and if it is reproducible at all. This feedback is very valuable for the Customers.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Reproduction option is available for functional bug\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"only\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can access the Bug Reproduction feature in three different ways on test IO platform:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Directly on your Tester dashboard:\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/215faaa2-425b-433f-b5f5-9fda0960874d/image2020-3-31_15-16-54.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":598,\"height\":467.00000000000006}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In a bug report submitted by another Tester. In case a reproduction spot is available for you, you will see the following message:\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d593dd10-44bb-4b76-b425-709b0f5f1fc5/image2020-3-31_15-18-33.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":587,\"height\":113}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In the \\\"Similar bug reports\\\" list. If while documenting a bug report you notice that your bug is displayed in the \\\"Similar bug reports\\\" section on the right-hand side, it means that the bug has already been reported by another Tester and may not be reported again. In this case, you can submit a reproduction instead by clicking on the button next to the respective entry in the list.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/8960a0ef-7936-4d45-8cd6-265232f901f4/image2020-3-31_15-19-26.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":613,\"height\":271}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"REPRODUCTION TYPES\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There are two reproduction types:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Positive Reproduction – after following the steps described in the original bug report, you experience the same bug.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Negative Reproduction – you cannot reproduce the bug despite following the same steps described in the original bug report. A negative reproduction must show that the functionality works on your device and that you don't experience any bugs.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please note:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" If you experience a different bug, this is neither a Positive nor a Negative Reproduction. In this case, please do not submit any reproductions but a new bug report instead.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Both reproduction types are equally valuable for the report evaluation process by the Team Leader and the Customer!\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"BUG REPRODUCTION RULES\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There are a number of rules that you have to follow when you submit a bug reproduction. It is important that your reproduction attachment meets test IO quality requirement and only shows the most necessary information:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For every bug reproduction you should upload a video attachment. In most cases, showing the action triggering the bug is enough.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Your screencast should be no longer than 15 seconds (unless in rare cases you cannot show the bug-triggering action \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"in 15 seconds \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(e.g. endless loading)–  in this case the screencast should be \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"not longer than the screencast from the original tester\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\").\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Your attachment should include the\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" current date \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"and the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"full URL \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"when testing a website.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When reproducing an app crash, please upload a crash log file in addition to your reproduction screencast. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Your screencast has to correspond to the attached crash log, i.e. timings must be coherent.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please note that your Reproduction will be reviewed by the Team Leader and could be either accepted or rejected - if, for example, you've selected a different device than the one you actually used, or wrong environment, or if your Reproduction attachment does not meet quality requirements. Please note that no rejection reason will be provided in this case.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Reproductions that don’t comply with the rules will be rejected, e.g. if your screencast is too long or if it shows unnecessary steps.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"REPRODUCTION SUBMISSION FORM\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can easily submit a Bug Reproduction by filling in the Reproduction Submission form, which looks as follows:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7641ce9f-f249-4646-ab34-65c1839523d5/image2020-3-31_15-20-58.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":398,\"height\":467}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"First of all, in the Reproduction Submission form you need to state if you can or cannot reproduce the bug – positive or negative reproduction. Then select the device and the browser that you used to reproduce the bug and upload a short video attachment. To submit your reproduction, simply click on the \\\"Create reproduction\\\" button.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"FEATURE AVAILABILITY\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can only submit a reproduction for a bug if:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"the test is currently running;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"it is not your own bug;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"it is a functional report;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"the report is not rejected and not accepted by the Customer;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"you have a required device (see right sidebar on test overview page);\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"you haven't submitted a reproduction for it yet;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"it has not already been reproduced with your device(s) by other Testers;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"the maximum number of reproductions for each bug report in this test has not been reached. The amount of available slots can be different from Customer to Customer.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In all other cases, you will not see the “Can you reproduce this bug: Yes or No” button in the bug report view. If you see that button, you are allowed to submit a reproduction.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
